title: Creating Pepper from American Horror Story - PPI booth, Son of Monsterpalooza
author: PPI Premiere Products
comment: She was perfect for this role! Her acting is so on point
When she came back as the baby bodyguard, I was smiling from one ear to the other :>
As a grown man.  I have to say the pepper episode, actually made me cry.
Damn pepper back at it again with the white vans
description:
American Horror Story makeup dept. head, Eryn Krueger Mekash and Special FX artist, Mike Mekash recreate Pepper the Pinhead, from season two - Asylum, at the PPI booth during Son of Monsterpalooza 2012.  Watch the makeup process as actress Naomi Grossman talks about her experience as Pepper, and see her interact with the crowd.
